response.answer_text: If you want to learn easy ICT management read this NETSUPPORT PROVIDES EASY ICT MANAGEMENT How can you effectively manage your Information Communications Technology (ICT) environment? Management which includes sharing files, installing updates and new software and troubleshooting individual desktop or workstation. Vinea Distribution, Inc, (VDI) partners with NetSupport to deliver innovative solutions to aid in the management of desktop computers and their users. NetSupport has been at the forefront of providing IT solutions for the last 25 years. Their products are available in over 90 countries worldwide and today support over 13 million desktops, servers and mobile devices. By providing this solution to our valued VDI partners we are further strengthening the capability to deploy systems that will grow both businesses and education in the Philippines. What sectors does NetSupport serve? Through the years, this has become ideal tool that serves both the corporate sector and the education sector. In the corporate sector, they had been a pioneer in the use of Remote Control technology, NetSupport’s products have evolved in line with working practices with the emphasis on Security and Performance. In the education sector, they help schools manage their ICT investment and overcome the challenges of maintaining the technology by supporting teachers and protecting students continue to grow. A total of 8 platforms and tools are being provided to allow easy management of ICT. Most notable among them are NetSupport Manager and NetSupport School.  NS Manager is a multi-platform remote control software that allows you to monitor multiple systems in a single action from a desktop, laptop, tablet or smartphone. It delivers hands-on remote support, collaborate and even record or play back sessions.  Meanwhile, NS School is a classroom instruction, orchestration, monitoring and management. It is the market-leading classroom software solution for schools. This tool supports a teacher with a wealth of dedicated assessment, monitoring, collaboration and control features to ensure they can leverage the very best from their ICT equipment.
